name: Forbidden Isle
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

In Forbidden Isle you are a pirate in search of a forbidden treasure. With a grapple gun at your disposal, you must traverse the island, avoid obstacles, collect coins, and get to the treasure at the other side of the island. 

KEY FEATURES:

Grappling Mechanic

Difficult Platforming Sections 

3 Unique Enemy Types

DISCLAIMER:

Currently the game has only one level but I am looking to add more levels and possible enemies in the future.
